chunks.zh: 兄弟们，有没有什么适合入门的副业呀。
chunks.en: Brothers, are there any suitable side hustles for beginners?

chunks.zh: 工作比较闲，有没有投入小，适合小白入门的那种副业。推荐推荐......
chunks.en: My job is relatively free, are there any side hustles with low investment that are suitable for beginners? Recommendations please...

chunks.zh: 什么下班摆摊，送外卖，跑滴滴，跑腿那些就是在浪费自己的生命，这种不能称作副业，这是自己拿时间换工作报酬，同时你也失去了主业以外的休息时间。
chunks.en: Things like setting up a stall after work, delivering food, driving for Didi, or running errands are a waste of your life. These cannot be called side hustles, this is using your time to exchange for work compensation, and at the same time you lose your rest time outside of your main job.

chunks.zh: 搞不好，最后因为做这些没有休息好，影响了你的主页。
chunks.en: If you're not careful, you might not get enough rest because of doing these things, which will affect your main job.

chunks.zh: 可能有人会喷我，但是喷就喷吧，每个人理解不一样
chunks.en: Some people may criticize me, but let them criticize, everyone's understanding is different.

chunks.zh: 炒币，赚了你财富自由，归零了你安心工作。
chunks.en: Trade crypto, if you earn, you'll have financial freedom, if it goes to zero, you can work with peace of mind.

chunks.zh: 最赚钱的副业，就是教别人做副业。。
chunks.en: The most profitable side hustle is teaching others how to do side hustles.

chunks.zh: 最靠谱的还是好好琢磨怎么把自己专业和兴趣结合起来，比如你兴趣骑行或钓鱼或下棋，你专业是写代码，那么就仔细思考寻找怎么利用代码把骑行或钓鱼或下棋整合一下，成功了赚钱，失败了也有收获，这才是你的主场。
chunks.en: The most reliable thing is to think carefully about how to combine your profession and interests. For example, if your interests are cycling, fishing, or playing chess, and your profession is writing code, then think carefully about how to use code to integrate cycling, fishing, or playing chess. If successful, you can make money, and if you fail, you will also gain something. This is your home field.

chunks.zh: 做那些烂大街的副业，只会被动陷入卷中。
chunks.en: Doing those common side hustles will only passively get you caught in the rat race.

chunks.zh: 女号小红书炫富
chunks.en: Female account on Little Red Book flaunting wealth

chunks.zh: 低成本，低门槛，高收益，属于副业的不可能三角。
chunks.en: Low cost, low threshold, high return, is the impossible triangle of side hustles.

chunks.zh: 毕竟都能满足，绝对有人当主业卷，然后收益就下来了。
chunks.en: After all, if all can be satisfied, someone will definitely treat it as a main job and the income will decrease.

chunks.zh: 所以楼主想想自己能放弃哪个，或者利用自身的职业和资源能解决哪个，才有的谈。
chunks.en: So, the poster should think about which one they can give up, or which one they can solve by using their own profession and resources, then there will be something to talk about.

chunks.zh: 整合公开资源，当大 V ，卖课
chunks.en: Integrate public resources, become a big V, and sell courses

chunks.zh: @pwelyn 是的，下班后休息好，锻炼好身体，每个人的精力有限
chunks.en: @pwelyn Yes, rest well after get off work, exercise your body, everyone's energy is limited

chunks.zh: a 股，现在遍地是黄金
chunks.en: A shares, now there is gold everywhere

chunks.zh: 币圈，撸空投
chunks.en: Crypto circle, farming airdrops

chunks.zh: 把闲置的房子租出去
chunks.en: Rent out the idle house

chunks.zh: @gcgj72 #4 我同事晚上送外卖，黑灯瞎火，把人撞了，赔了好几个 W
chunks.en: @gcgj72 #4 My colleague delivered food at night, in the dark, hit someone, and paid several W in compensation

chunks.zh: @javalaw2010 #15 你就是 HKD ？🐶
chunks.en: @javalaw2010 #15 Are you HKD? 🐶

chunks.zh: 同蹲，想想，谁会让你自学成才？
chunks.en: Same here, think about it, who will let you become self-taught?

chunks.zh: 滴滴， 外卖。 快行动起来吧
chunks.en: Didi, delivery. Act quickly

chunks.zh: @cqmzgg2023 集思广益 [手动狗头]
chunks.en: @cqmzgg2023 Brainstorming [manual dog head]

chunks.zh: 外卖 投入小
chunks.en: Delivery Low investment

chunks.zh: @Duanpei 大厂门槛太高了，换一个
chunks.en: @Duanpei The threshold for big factories is too high, change to another one

chunks.zh: 夜跑路上不是外卖骑手就是代驾，投入就是电动车或者折叠自行车，而且不占用白天工作时间。。。。。。
chunks.en: On the night run, it's either delivery riders or drivers, the investment is an electric car or a folding bicycle, and it doesn't take up daytime work time........

chunks.zh: v 我 100 我告诉你有什么入门的副业
chunks.en: V me 100 and I'll tell you what side hustles are available for beginners
